rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ramp and automatic doors leading to central courtyard. Minimalist aesthetic, with polished concrete finishes.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with open-plan layout facing the courtyard; integrates indoor-outdoor space via large glass sliding doors in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open dining space adjacent to the living room, minimalistic design featuring built-in seating and lighting that enhances natural light per Vastu orientation.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact kitchen with high-end appliances and modular cabinetry; designed for wheelchair accessibility with lower countertops and integrated pantry storage.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Multipurpose utility room housing cleaning supplies, guest amenities, and a small laundry area. Ensures ease of access and efficient workflow.

openings.description: Double doors with automatic sensors for accessibility.
Automated gate providing access to the two-car garage.
Large glass window connecting the living room with the central courtyard, designed for natural light and Vastu compliance.

garage.description: Spacious two-car garage with dedicated parking bays and integrated storage solutions. Accessible design with ramps for wheelchair users.
